function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of profiles on the correspondence plot.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to maintain physical distance and ventilation in the built environment.","Technologies":"Use of air purifiers, HVAC systems, and occupancy monitoring technology.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of relationship between variables due to observed distance not providing exact measure.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to misguided decisions in disease mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Utilize additional statistical methods to validate the relationship between variables.","Technologies":"Statistical software for data analysis and validation.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"High inertia indicating greater distance between profiles, potentially leading to ineffective planning of infrastructures for disease prevention.","Impact":"Inefficiencies in infrastructure planning for disease prevention and mitigation.","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional data sources and expert input to ensure comprehensive analysis.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, simulation software, and collaboration platforms.","People":"Urban planners, infrastructure designers, and public health experts.","Owner":"Government agencies, infrastructure planning organizations, and public health authorities."}]}
